item.description:
This is a smaller version of Lil Viny's Ristorante and is considered one of Boston's hidden gems. Vinny's at Night is located in the back of a convenience store and serves typical Sicialian specialties.

Here is the web site to the restaurant w ith menu: http://www.vinnysonbr...

A link to a review: http://www.phantomgou...

The closest T stop is Sullivan Square on the orange line. Its a short walk from there. There is also street parking if you want to drive.
item.how_to_find_us: I will wait in front of the store at 7pm

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Viny's at Night in Somerville
